text:
@PressSec @realDonaldTrump You and the @realDonaldTrump Administration are probably the Dumbest People I have ever seen .
COVID-19 isn't just going to disappear. 
There are Millions not working. 
They are having trouble getting Unemployment  
There are Millions with No Income. 
They have received 1200
